## case studies
* [Rinaldi, L., et al. (2016). "Dnmt3a and Dnmt3b Associate with Enhancers to Regulate Human Epidermal Stem Cell Homeostasis." Cell stem cell 19(4): 491-501.](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1934590916301953?via%3Dihub)

* [Spruijt, C. G., et al. (2013). "Dynamic readers for 5-(hydroxy)methylcytosine and its oxidized derivatives." Cell 152(5): 1146-1159.](https://www.cell.com/abstract/S0092-8674%2813%2900152-9)

* [Iurlaro, M., et al. (2013). "A screen for hydroxymethylcytosine and formylcytosine binding proteins suggests functions in transcription and chromatin regulation." Genome Biol 14(10): R119.](https://genomebiology.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/gb-2013-14-10-r119)
